ServiceAppointmentAttendee.name: ServiceAppointmentAttendee
ServiceAppointmentAttendee.description: Represents a Lead, Contact, or Person Account who is associated with the Service Appointment of type Group.

AttendeeId.description: The customer who is attending the associated service appointment.

AttendeeIdentifier.description: The alphanumeric unique identifier of the appointment attendee. For example, D101, E63, A5015.

HasAttended.description: Indicates whether the attendee has attended the associated service appointment (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the service appointment attendee record was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the service appointment attendee record was last viewed.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the service appointment attendee record.

ServiceAppointmentId.description: The service appointment associated with the appointment attendee.

Status.description: The status of the service appointment attendee.
